The Gotham Guardian

1 / 18

Batman stands guard over Gotham City. Position Batman in the center of the battlefield.

Cross Axis
Main Axis
flex-direction: row

Code the solution to help Batman save the Gotham

Center Batman both horizontally and vertically

.battlefield {

}
Suggestions:

Flexbox Command Reference

justify-content
flex-start | center | flex-end | space-between | space-around | space-evenly
align-items
flex-start | center | flex-end | stretch | baseline
flex-direction
row | column | row-reverse | column-reverse
flex-wrap
nowrap | wrap | wrap-reverse
align-content
flex-start | center | flex-end | space-between | space-around | stretch
gap
length value (e.g., 10px, 1rem)
